Adjective: Indefinite: кто-то, кто-нибудь, кто-либо, кое-кто, etc.
Interrogative: кто, что, какой, ли, etc.
Relativizer, e.g. который, где, как, куда, сколько, etc.
Transitive (Zaliznjak does not mark trans-only, so transitive verbs all have both TV and IV)
Present active participle (+PrsAct+Adv for verbal adverbs)
Present passive participle (+PstAct+Adv for the verbal adverbs)
Count (for человек/людей or лет/годов, etc. also шага́/шара́/часа́/etc.)
Synthetic comparative is possible, e.g. старее
Predicate, also used for short-form adjectives
Compound, used for compounding adjectives, such as русско-английский
Attenuative comparatives like получше, поновее, etc.
Object of preposition (epenthetic н: него нее них) TODO FIX WITHFRAN merge PObj and Epenth > Epenth? Sandhi?
epenthesis on prepositions (о~об~обо or в~во)      TODO FIX WITHFRAN merge PObj and Epenth > Epenth? Sandhi?
Lengthened доброй~доброю (marks less-canonical wordform that has more syllables)
Do not generate (used for apertium, etc.)
L2 error: Failure to change ending ие to ии in +Sg+Loc or +Sg+Dat, e.g. к Марие, о кафетерие, о знание
L2 error: Palatalization: failure to place soft-indicating symbol after soft stem, e.g. земла (compare земля)
L2 error: Presence of fleeting vowel where it should be deleted, e.g. отеца (compare отца)
L2 error: Lack of fleeting vowel where it should be inserted, e.g. окн (compare окон)
L2 error: Failure to change о to е after hushers and ц, e.g. Сашой (compare Сашей)
L2 error: Failure to change ы to и after hushers and velars, e.g. книгы (compare книги)
